text: you cant change the configuration options on the default HS image slider can you? Like moving the thumbnails above the slider?
I mean ideally only thing to move it would be straight up JS or rebuilding the slider with a custom one to control it right?

That’s what we’ve generally done. they use a modified version of <http://kenwheeler.github.io/slick/>

We usually use the same slider and roll our own.
I mean if you’re using a DM2 site it wouldn’t be hard at all to build a new slider module with repeatable groups
<@U2H3TT8F2> if you have a portal that needs access to the new Design Manager just let us know…
will do i recommended they move to it, if they get back to me i will let them know.
